sentences.sContent: The kinetoscope, which could only be viewed by one person at a time, was soon replaced by screen projectors , which showed the movie to a whole room of people at once.
sentences.sContent_eng: The kinetoscope, which could only be viewed by one person at a time, was soon replaced by screen projectors , which showed the movie to a whole room of people at once.
sentences.sCn: 电影放映机一开始一次只能有一个观众，不过后来很快就被投影机所取代，这部机器可以让一屋子的人一起欣赏电影。

synos.tran: 活动电影放映机；活动照相机；投观影装置
